testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDeviceInformationSubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.10.18 [Need to Share Section Timing Pattern Schedule] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish Section Timing Pattern Schedule Information (NTRM 3.3.5.11.12.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N103R1089_Publish_Section_Timing_Pattern_Schedule_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N103R1089_Publish_Section_Timing_Pattern_Schedule_Information_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to Section Timing Pattern Schedule Information (NTRM 3.3.5.11.12.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N103R1090_Subscribe_to_Section_Timing_Pattern_Schedule_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N103R1090_Subscribe_to_Section_Timing_Pattern_Schedule_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N103R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N103R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Section Schedule is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.12.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N103R1094_Restrictions___Section_Schedule_Supported = ${TMDD_N103R1094_Restrictions___Section_Schedule_Supported}
Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 9 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 12 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 15 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDeviceInformationSubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 16 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 16.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 16.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionControlScheduleUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N103R1089_Publish_Section_Timing_Pattern_Schedule_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 16.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 16.1.2.1 VERIFY that a sectionControlScheduleMsg message was received.
Step 16.1.2.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.3 VERIFY that a section-id data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.4 VERIFY that a time-base-schedule-number data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.5 VERIFY that a time-base-schedule-month data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.6 VERIFY that a time-base-schedule-day data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.7 VERIFY that a time-base-schedule-date data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.8 VERIFY that a time-base-schedule-day-plan data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.9 VERIFY that a day-plan-hour data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.10 VERIFY that a day-plan-minute data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.11 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.12 VERIFY that a node-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.13 VERIFY that a request-control-mode data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.14 VERIFY that a timing-pattern-id data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.15 IF TMDD_N103R1094_Restrictions___Section_Schedule_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 16.1.2.15.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionControlScheduleMsg.section-control-schedule-item
Step 16.1.2.16 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 16.1.2.17 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 16.1.2.18 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionControlScheduleUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N103R1089_Publish_Section_Timing_Pattern_Schedule_Information_Parameter CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage

Step 17 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 17.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 17.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 17.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 17.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 17.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 17.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to SubscriptionErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 17.7 IF TMDD_N103R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 17.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 18 EXIT
